title: Mod Options
description: Controls declarative mod compatibility and mod-wide settings.

techsToRemove.description: List of Technologies or technologyFilter to remove (isBaseRuleset=false only).

buildingsToRemove.description: List of Buildings, Wonders or buildingFilter to remove (isBaseRuleset=false only).

unitsToRemove.description: List of Units or unitFilter to remove (isBaseRuleset=false only).

nationsToRemove.description: List of Nations or nationFilter to remove (isBaseRuleset=false only).

policyBranchesToRemove.description: List of Policy Branches to remove (isBaseRuleset=false only).

policiesToRemove.description: List of Policies to remove (isBaseRuleset=false only).

constants.description: A collection of constants used internally in Unciv. This is the only structure that is merged field by field from mods, not overwritten, so you can change XP from Barbarians in one mod and city distance in another. In case of conflicts, there is no guarantee which mod wins, only that default values are ignored.

maxXPfromBarbarians.description: Max amount of experience that can be gained from combat with barbarians.

cityStrengthFromTechsMultiplier.description: Multiplier for strength gained from techs.

cityStrengthFromTechsExponent.description: Exponent for strength gained from techs.

cityStrengthFromTechsFullMultiplier.description: Full multiplier for strength from techs.

cityStrengthFromGarrison.description: Multiplier for strength from garrison units.

baseCityBombardRange.description: The distance that cities can attack.

cityWorkRange.description: The tiles in distance that population in cities can work on.

cityExpandRange.description: The distance that cities can expand their borders to.

cityAirUnitCapacity.description: Number of air units that can be stationed in a city.

minimalCityDistance.description: Minimal distance between any two cities on the same landmass.

minimalCityDistanceOnDifferentContinents.description: Minimal distance between cities on different continents.

naturalWonderCountMultiplier.description: Multiplier for number of natural wonders spawned.

naturalWonderCountAddedConstant.description: Constant added to number of natural wonders spawned.

ancientRuinCountMultiplier.description: Multiplier for number of ancient ruins spawned.

spawnIceBelowTemperature.description: Temperature threshold below which ice spawns.

maxLakeSize.description: Maximum size of lakes in tiles.

religionLimitMultiplier.description: Multiplier for number of foundable religions.

pantheonGrowth.description: Growth cost of pantheon per civ with religion.

workboatAutomationSearchMaxTiles.description: Max tiles for workboat automation search.

maxSpyRank.description: Maximum rank any spy can reach.

spyRankSkillPercentBonus.description: Skill percent bonus per spy rank.

minimumWarDuration.description: Minimum number of turns before peace negotiation.

baseTurnsUntilRevolt.description: Number of turns before a revolt is spawned.

cityStateElectionTurns.description: Number of turns between city-state elections.

maxImprovementTechErasForward.description: Improvement picker skips improvements whose tech requirement is more advanced than current Era + this value.

goldGiftMultiplier.description: Multiplier for gold value of one-sided trade stored as gifts.

goldGiftTradeMultiplier.description: Multiplier for gold value of regular trade stored as gifts.

goldGiftDegradationMultiplier.description: Multiplier for how quickly the GaveUsGifts diplomacy modifier runs out.

tileset.description: Tileset name. Only applicable for base rulesets.

unitset.description: Unitset name. Only applicable for base rulesets.
